mapper.select: select (SELECT count(*) FROM appr_accept where mem_no =#{memNo} and read ='N') apprRead, (SELECT count(*) FROM reference where ref_no =#{memNo} and read ='N') referRead from dual

select count(*) from approval a join( SELECT doc_no, ','||LISTAGG(mem_no||',',',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_no) AS mem_no from( SELECT doc_no, ref_mem_no mem_no FROM reference union SELECT doc_no, mem_no FROM appr_accept union SELECT doc_no, mem_no FROM approval) GROUP BY DOC_NO ) appr_include on(appr_include.doc_no =A.DOC_NO) where appr_include.mem_no like '%,' || 3 || ',%'

select a.doc_no ,a.form_no ,mem_name||' '|| m.rank mem_name ,ref_mem_no ,mem_no_fin ,department ,doc_name ,category ,form_name ,doc_content ,doc_date ,a.status ,line ,SORT from approval a join appr_form f on(f.form_no = a.form_no) join member m on(m.mem_no =a.mem_no) JOIN (SELECT DOC_NO, LISTAGG(mem_name ||' '|| rank,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY APPR_LEVEL) AS line FROM APPR_ACCEPT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) GROUP BY DOC_NO ORDER BY DOC_NO) AL ON (A.DOC_NO = AL.DOC_NO) full JOIN( SELECT * FROM( select DOC_NO, mem_no, mem_name ||' '|| rank SORT ,RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY DOC_NO ORDER BY APPR_LEVEL ASC) AS RANK from appr_accept aa join member m using(mem_no) where aa.status='대기' order by APPR_level) WHERE RANK=1 ) CURRENT_LEVEL ON(A.DOC_NO = CURRENT_LEVEL.DOC_NO) join( -- 관련 문서 전체 조회시 사용 SELECT doc_no, ','||LISTAGG(mem_no||',',',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_no) AS mem_no from( SELECT doc_no, ref_mem_no mem_no FROM reference union SELECT doc_no, mem_no FROM appr_accept union SELECT doc_no, mem_no FROM approval) GROUP BY DOC_NO ) appr_include on(appr_include.doc_no =A.DOC_NO) -- 참조문서 폴더 조회시 사용 full join( SELECT doc_no, ','||LISTAGG(ref_mem_no||',',',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ref_mem_no) AS ref_mem_no FROM reference GROUP BY DOC_NO ) appr_refer on(appr_refer.doc_no =A.DOC_NO) -- 결재/반려완료 폴더 조회시 사용 full join( SELECT doc_no, ','||LISTAGG(mem_no||',',',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_no) AS mem_no_fin FROM appr_accept GROUP BY DOC_NO ,status having status ='승인' or status='반려') appr_fin on(appr_fin.doc_no =A.DOC_NO)
where appr_include.mem_no like '%,' || #{memNo} || ',%'
--상신문서 and a.mem_no = #{memNo} and a.status != '완료' --상신 문서 중 완료문서 and a.mem_no = #{memNo} and a.status = '완료' --임시저장 and a.mem_no = #{memNo} and a.status = '임시' --결재대기 and CURRENT_LEVEL.mem_no = #{memNo} --결재자가 결재 and mem_no_fin like '%,' || #{memNo} || ',%' --참조 and ref_mem_no like '%,' || #{memNo} || ',%' order by doc_date desc
SELECT doc_no , mem_no , read FROM appr_accept where mem_no =#{memNo} UNION SELECT doc_no , ref_mem_no mem_no , read FROM reference where ref_mem_no =#{memNo}
select count(*) from appr_form where status IN ('A', 'Y')
select FORM_NO, CATEGORY, FORM_NAME, FORM_INFO from appr_form where status IN ('A', 'Y')

select mem_no, mem_name, EMAIL, dep_no, department, job, rank from member where status IN ('A', 'Y') and resign_date is null order by DEP_NO ,JOB NULLS LAST ,decode(rank,'대표이사',1,'상무',2,'부장',3,'과장',4,'대리',5) ,mem_name

select rownum as line_level, mem_no, mem_name, EMAIL, dep_no, department, job, rank, '결재' "type" from ( select rownum as num, a.* from ( select mem_no, mem_name, EMAIL, dep_no, department, job, rank,par_dep_class from member join department using(dep_no) where dep_no = (select par_dep_class from department where dep_class=#{deptNo}) or dep_no = (select par_dep_class from department where dep_class=(select par_dep_class from department where dep_class=#{deptNo})) or dep_no=#{deptNo} and job is not null order by decode(rank,'대표이사',1,'상무',2,'부장',3,'과장',4,'대리',5))a where mem_no !=#{memNo} order by num desc) order by line_level

select form_no docNo , mem_no2 mem_no , mem_name , line_level , type , EMAIL , dep_no , department , job , rank from appr_line al join member m on( al.mem_no2=m.mem_no) where al.mem_no =#{memNo} and form_no=#{formNo} order by line_level

INSERT into appr_accept ( LINE_NO , DOC_NO , MEM_NO , APPR_LEVEL , TYPE ) SELECT SEQ_LINO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_APNO.CURRVAL, A.* FROM(
select #{a.memNo} as memNo , #{a.apprLevel} as apprLevel , #{a.type} as type FROM DUAL ) A

INSERT INTO ma_attach ( FILE_NO , DOC_NO , FILE_TYPE , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_URL , FILE_LEVEL ) SELECT SEQ_AANO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_APNO.CURRVAL , A.* FROM(
select '전자결재' as fileType , #{at.originName} as originName , #{at.fileUrl} as fileUrl , #{at.fileLevel} as fileLevel FROM DUAL ) A

INSERT INTO reference ( REF_NO , DOC_NO , REF_MEM_NO ) SELECT SEQ_ARNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_APNO.CURRVAL , A.* FROM(
select #{item} as memNo FROM DUAL ) A
mapper.select: select form_no , a.doc_no , a.mem_no , mem_name ||' '|| m.rank mem_name , m.department , doc_name , refer_mem ref_mem_no , doc_content , a.status , doc_date , category , form_name,sort from approval a join appr_form using(form_no) join member m on(a.mem_no = m.mem_no) full join ( SELECT doc_no, LISTAGG(DEPARTMENT||' '||MEM_NAME||' '||RANK,' / ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY doc_no) AS refer_mem FROM reference join member on(mem_no = ref_mem_no) GROUP BY doc_no)r on(a.doc_no=r.doc_no) full JOIN( SELECT * FROM( select DOC_NO, mem_no SORT ,RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY DOC_NO ORDER BY APPR_LEVEL ASC) AS RANK from appr_accept aa join member m using(mem_no) where aa.status='대기' and doc_no=#{docNo} order by APPR_level) WHERE RANK=1 ) CURRENT_LEVEL ON(a.DOC_NO = CURRENT_LEVEL.DOC_NO) where a.doc_no= #{docNo}
select FILE_NO ,DOC_NO ,FILE_TYPE ,ORIGIN_NAME ,FILE_URL ,FILE_LEVEL from ma_attach where doc_no=#{docNo} and file_type='전자결재'

select doc_no , mem_no , MEM_NAME , JOB , RANK , department , appr_level , type||aa.status STATUS , read , appr_date , APPR_MEMO from appr_accept aa join member m using(mem_no) where doc_no=#{docNo} order by appr_level
